newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT-Molten Metal cut to hold.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT-Molten Metal cut to hold.

text.p: -- Deutsche Morgan Grenfell lowered Molten Metal Technology Inc to a hold from its prior rating of buy and cut future profit estimates for the company.

-- Analyst Rod Lache in a research report said he cut the stock after a Sunday night conference call with analysts in which the company announced it expected a revenue shortfall after the U.S. government cut some funding for the company.
-- Molten also announced some new long-term strategies which Lache said could hurt Molten Metal's short-term profits.
-- Lache said he cut 1996 Q3 estimates to a loss of $0.03 from his prior estimate of a profit of $0.23 a share, and 1996 Q4 estimates to nil from his prior estimate of a profit of $0.12 a share.
-- shares fell 12-1/4 to 15-7/8, a new 52-week low.
